name: Publicly Readable AWS Buckets
query: { buckets( where: { cloudProvider: "aws" publicAccessBlocked: false OR: [ { hasBucketACLGrant_SOME: { OR: [ { granteeURI: "http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers" } { granteeURI: "http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AuthenticatedUsers" } ] permission_IN: ["READ", "FULL_CONTROL"] } } { bucketPolicy: { AND: [ { statements_SOME: { effect: "Allow" OR: [ { actions_INCLUDES: "s3:GetObject" } { actions_INCLUDES: "s3:ListObjects" } { actions_INCLUDES: "s3:ListObjectsV2" } { actions_INCLUDES: "s3:*" } { actions_INCLUDES: "*" } ] principals_INCLUDES: "AWS|*" } } { statements_NONE: { effect: "Deny" OR: [ { actions_INCLUDES: "s3:GetObject" } { actions_INCLUDES: "s3:ListObjects" } { actions_INCLUDES: "s3:ListObjectsV2" } { actions_INCLUDES: "s3:*" } { actions_INCLUDES: "*" } ] principals_INCLUDES: "AWS|*" } } ] } } ] } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory contentHash } }
